response:
The subacute onset of multifocal neurological deficits in a 61-year-old male strongly suggests an inflammatory demyelinating disorder, though the age is slightly atypical for classical MS onset. Therefore, antibody-mediated diseases (NMOSD, MOGAD) must be prioritised alongside MS. Given the age, CNS lymphoma and granulomatous diseases (Sarcoidosis) are critical to exclude.

differential_diagnosis = ["Multiple Sclerosis", "Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorder (NMOSD)", "MOG Antibody Disease (MOGAD)", "Primary CNS Lymphoma", "Neurosarcoidosis", "Paraneoplastic Cerebellar Degeneration"]
